name: > AD User Enrichment
description: Enrich user with Active Directory data

params.msg: Email Mismatch: FortiSOAR recorded user email is  {{vars.fsr_recorded_email}} while Active Directory record shows: {{vars.user_attributes.mail}} Update FortiSOAR user email and try again

arguments.name: Active Directory

arguments.user_details:
{
    "email": "{{vars.user_attributes.mail or vars.user_attributes.userPrincipalName or None}}",
    "whenUserCreated": "{{arrow.get(vars.user_attributes.whenCreated).to("UTC").format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ") or None}}",
    "reportsTo": "{%if vars.user_attributes.manager|length > 0%}{{vars.user_attributes.manager.split('=')[1].split(',')[0]}}{%endif%}",
    "jobTitle": "{{vars.user_attributes.title or None}}",
    "mobileNumber": "{{vars.user_attributes.telephoneNumber or vars.user_attributes.mobile or vars.user_attributes.homePhone or '+97543548856'}}",
    "memberOf": "{%if vars.user_attributes.memberOf|length > 0%}{%for i in vars.user_attributes.memberOf%}{{i.split('=')[1].split(',')[0]+', '}}{%endfor%}{%endif%}",
    "department": "{{vars.user_attributes.department or 'IT'}}",
    "passwordLastSet": "{{arrow.get(vars.user_attributes.pwdLastSet).to("UTC").format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ") or None}}",
    "lastLogin": {{vars.user_attributes.lastLogon or None}},
    "domain": "{%set tmp_dom=vars.user_attributes.distinguishedName.split(',')%}{%for entry in tmp_dom%}{%if 'DC=' in entry%}{{entry.split('DC=')[1]+'.'}}{%endif%}{%endfor%}",
    "securityId": "{{vars.user_attributes.objectSid or None}}",
    "managerEmail": "{{vars.manager_attributes.mail or vars.manager_attributes.userPrincipalName or None}}",
    "managerPhoneNumber": "{{vars.manager_attributes.telephoneNumber or vars.manager_attributes.mobile or vars.manager_attributes.homePhone or None}}"
    }

routes.name: Get Manager Attributes -> Set Manager Attributes
Get User Attributes -> Set user Attributes
Set User Data -> Get User Attributes
User Exists -> Valid FSR Email Address
routes.label: yes

routes.name: Valid FSR Email Address -> Email Mismatch
routes.label: no

routes.name: Valid FSR Email Address -> Get Manager Attributes
routes.label: yes
